title._content: Image taken from page 249 of '[The Odyssey of Homer. [Translated into English verse, by Pope, W. Broome, and E. Fenton; with notes by W. Broome.] (A general view of the Epic poem, and of the Iliad and Odyssey, extracted from Bossu. Postscript, by Mr Pope.

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Odyssey of Homer. [Translated into English verse, by Pope, W. Broome, and E. Fenton; with notes by W. Broome.] (A general view of the Epic poem, and of the Iliad and Odyssey, extracted from Bossu. Postscript, by Mr Pope. Homer's Battle of the Frogs and Mice [translated by T. Parnell], corrected by Mr Pope.)]", "Odyssey. English. Complete Text" Author: Homer. Contributor: FENTON, Elijah. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12270.k.8.", "British Library HMNTS C.130.e.7.", "British Library HMNTS 75.g.10-14.", "British Library HMNTS 1348.i.13." Volume: 03 Page: 249 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1725 Publisher: Printed for Bernard Lintot Edition: [Another edition.] F.P. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001722934 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
